-- Anachronox / Pacifix / Crossroads --

Anachronox nods and continues to follow Belthassan.

"Her obvious dislike of me may get her killed sometime..." He grunts 
as they walk, "Hmmm..."

---------------------

Pacifix nods in approval, his sorrow noticable even though he doesn't 
allow it to affect his job. "We appreciate your support Gesper. I 
have a bad feeling about Firedrill/Anachronox; I don't think that 
we'll be able to get Firedrill back..."

He heads to the exit, "I'm heading over to your base now," he 
inclines his head in Gesper's direction, "Crossroads, I'll need you 
to watch the base till I get back. Just hover around the control room 
and monitor the perimeter defenses. They should warn you of anything 
out of order."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Belthassan: Yes. I guess our commander is eager to see you. Come 
with 
> me. He is in the control room.
> 
> He starts walking. He turns his head to the rookie and says:
> 
> Belthassan: Curious one, is she not?
> 
> ------------------------
> 
> Gesper seemed astonished by the news.
> 
> Gesper: Ah... well... I... wanted to know if you had had any news 
from 
> the Tripredacus, but I guess you just gave me those news... I'm 
sorry 
> about what happened. Even if Firedrill cannot be brought back 
though, 
> you can be assured that we will stand aside the Autobots.
